title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar Build 200201151. Searching for references to this field5.
OB: When searching for references to a field in an external jar, the search results are not selected.
EB: You should get 3 matches selected in the method getTempDir() when searching for references to this field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Search for references to the specified field in an external jar.
2. Observe that the search results are not selected as expected.
3. Additionally, the method getTempDir() should have 3 matches selected.
